getTaskFunctionAccessor

<T extends ITaskFunction> ITaskFunctionAccessor<T> getTaskFunctionAccessor(java.lang.Class<T> functionClass)
Gets the task function accessor for the specified task function class.

This accessor provides access to the task function as well as the means to check whether the task function is available.
Please note that accessor will be returned by this function even if the task providing it is not running. Calling ITaskFunctionAccessor.get() of the returned accessor will result in an exception in this case. Please use methods ITaskFunctionAccessor.isAvailable() or ITaskFunctionAccessor#await() to check if the function is accessible.

Example:
// get task function accessor
ITaskFunctionAccessor taskFunction = getTaskFunction(IMyTaskFunction.class);
// use task function
taskFunction.get().doSomething();

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the task function.
Parameters:
functionClass - The task function class.
Returns:
The task function accessor for the given task function class.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if specified task function type is not known.

getTaskFunctionAccessor

<T extends ITaskFunction> ITaskFunctionAccessor<T> getTaskFunctionAccessor(ITaskInstance taskInstance,
                                                                           java.lang.Class<T> functionClass)
Gets the task function accessor for the specified task function class.

This accessor provides access to the task function as well as the means to check whether the task function is available.
Please note that accessor will be returned by this function even if the task providing it is not running. Calling ITaskFunctionAccessor.get() of the returned accessor will result in an exception in this case. Please use methods ITaskFunctionAccessor.isAvailable() or ITaskFunctionAccessor#await() to check if the function is accessible.

Example:
// get task function accessor
ITaskFunctionAccessor taskFunction = getTaskFunction(IMyTaskFunction.class);
// use task function
taskFunction.get().doSomething();

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the task function.
Parameters:
taskInstance - The task instance to return the function accessor for.
functionClass - The task function class.
Returns:
The task function accessor for the given task function class.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if specified task function type is not known.
